com.simulus.io

Class SimConfigXML

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simulus.io.SimConfigXML

  • public class SimConfigXML
extends java.lang.Object
    Used by the Simulus suite of applications, (MainApp) for importing and exporting a Simulus simulation file which contains simulation parameters. XML data format used.

    • Method Detail

      • readXML

        public void readXML(java.lang.String inputFile)
        Reads a Simulus XML simulation file. Error thrown if the file does not match expected schema
        Parameters:
        inputFile - the simulation file

      • writeXML

        public void writeXML(java.lang.String outputFile,
                     java.lang.String nameIn,
                     java.lang.String dateIn,
                     java.lang.String descIn,
                     java.lang.String authIn,
                     double noCarsIn,
                     double tickRateIn,
                     double spawnRateIn,
                     double maxSpeedIn,
                     double carTruckRatioIn,
                     boolean debugIn,
                     double recklessNormRatioIn,
                     java.lang.String carColourOptionIn,
                     java.lang.String carColourIn,
                     java.lang.String truckColourOptionIn,
                     java.lang.String truckColourIn)
        Outputs a Simulus simulation file with the passed parameters
        Parameters:
        outputFile - the file path to save the output including a filename
        nameIn - a name for the simulation
        dateIn - the date and time the simulation was last saved
        descIn - a description for the simulation file
        authIn - the author of the simulation settings file
        noCarsIn - the number of cars used in the simulation
        tickRateIn - the tick rate used in the simulation
        spawnRateIn - the spawn rate used in the simulation
        maxSpeedIn - the maximum speed of cars in the simulation
        carTruckRatioIn - the ration of cars to trucks in the simulation
        debugIn - if the simulation should run in debug mode
        recklessNormRatioIn - the ratio of reckless to normal cars in the simulation
        carColourOptionIn - the source of colour for cars in the simulation
        carColourIn - the custom car colour when the user defined option us used in the simulation
        truckColourOptionIn - the source of colour for trucks in the simulation
        truckColourIn - the custom truck colour when the user defined option us used in the simulation
